description.en:
Lepricon seeks to unlock and realise the potential of gaming and NFTs in blockchain by providing a platform for gamified DeFi dApps with a core focus on the user experience.

Lepricon provides a highly rewarding environment in which participants can leverage the benefits of DeFi in a gamified way – opening up DeFi to a larger and more engaged audience. 

Lepricon is a Decentralised Autonomous Organisation (DAO) – an organisation represented by rules enshrined in computer code that is transparent and controlled by the network participants and not by a central authority.
